data.eml:eml: Illustrated guide to the echinoid (Echinodermata: Echinoidea) fauna of South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Filander, Zoleka, Griffiths, Charles (2017): Illustrated guide to the echinoid (Echinodermata: Echinoidea) fauna of South Africa. Zootaxa 4296 (1): 1-72, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4296.1.1
